column5: Well everyone, its been almost 2 weeks since I've been on the water.  Looking for work and helping the in-laws move (closer to the lake... WOOHOO).  Filling early orders for laker takers and the up coming ice season.  I'm itching for this wind to pass through and get back on the water, I figured I'd add some fish porn for everyone to have a gander at during these hard times, lol.  Next week looks mint!  Hoping to be on the water lots! This is the best time of year to land those giant smallies!   clients with a nice double header!  Giant almost 7 in July!  nice day!  Good day with dad!  Happy client!  Kelli learning the art of the dropshot  Another happy client  Good day out with good friends  Nice one!  Kelli's PB @ 6lbs 13oz  Nice tournament bag  Pig  Some nice bronze    Oh man I cant wait for next week!!!

I should add that dropshotting became a big part of my success this year.  I never realized until this season how crucial a dropshot is in my tackle selection.  Strike Zone slammers made by our board member Mark Kulik put A LOT of fish in my boat this year!
That's quite a year, nice shooting!
Nice Hogs Steve I'm hoping to get out next week too Richard
Very nice. I always enjoy the pics you put up.
Serious multitude of hogs Steve..... awesome Leechman
BIG pigs! I would love to see some of the largies you and your clients caught this year too. Nicely done.
WOW incredible. I can't wait to make it to Simcoe and Erie. Imma move to Oakville. Right in between
As usual Steve, great job on the bass
Thats a nice Pair Kelly has there Steve.  Just razzin, some nice fish for sure. Only getting better this year for sure.
I went out and got slammers in the same color you showed me and started dropshotting.  I hope I can get better at it and put some big bass into the boat
That is some crazy fishin right there
Some COW'S there....   everybody looks like they are having a good time too..
